channel.title: *Need 317 Audio Help*
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm creating my own 317 server from Scratch, blank source. If anybody could tell me how to add Music and Sounds, It'd be very much appreciated!
Also ; can somebody tell me how to add Server Messages? Thanks :D
- Moojo .

item.title: *Need 317 Audio Help*
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

I’m pretty sure Java has a built-in sound API… you should go check out oracle’s site for more info.

Read full topic

    for sound
    server message should be already added
    try sM
    or SendMessage
